Verses.1: Then the angel showed me a river of the water of life. It's crystal clear and flowing from the thrown of God and of the Lamb.
Verses.2: It flows down the middle of the street, and nourished the tree of life. The tree produces twelve kinds of fruit, every month for harvest, and its leaves were for the healing of the nations.
Verses.3: No longer will there be any curse. The throne of God and of the Lamb will be in the city, and His servants will serve Him.
Verses.4: They will see his face, and his name will be on their foreheads.
Verses.5: No longer will there be night. No longer will they need the light of a lamp, nor the light of the sun. For the Lord God will be their light. And they will reign forever and ever.

Changes: 2021-08-06 - Paul Prins: First translation of chapter 22:1-5.
